ComicInfo.Summary: Who will be the Final Girl? That's for you to decide! You, the reader, will vote to determine who lives and who dies! The surviving students find themselves trapped within the bloodstained walls of the town's iron factory. There, they encounter a mysterious survivor who may know the secret of escaping the town, but the horrific maniacs who populate the place are closing in on them. Will Naomi, Heather, Ashley, and the rest of group sacrifice one of their own in order to survive? And who or what is the being known as 'The Skinner?' From the disturbed mind of David Hutchison (Oz: The Manga, Beowulf) comes this all-new series set in a world of unimaginable horror!
